name: SPACE JUNK (itch)
description:
An intergalactic tiff has led to a lot of angry humans! Don't let them make a fool out of you! Play as a randomly generated SHMUP enemy and teach them who's boss!

Featuring:

  • Random boss generation!
  • Multi-level difficulty!
  • Fully audible!
  • Wave randomization!
  • Story!
  • A final boss to fight with your final boss!

A game created for LD33 in 48 hours, a rating would be greatly appreciated:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=55244
